title: Khloe Kardashian gets major makeover
text:
Email a friend 
KHLOE Kardashian skipped Kim’s birthday party to stay at husband Lamar Odom’s bedside. 
But after nearly two weeks out of the spotlight, she left the hospital to celebrate her big sister’s baby shower — and debut a fresh new look. 
The 31-year-old’s hairdresser, Jen Atkin, shared a snap of the reality TV star’s new textured, collarbone-grazing cut, dubbed the “fashion lob.” 
“Guess who just joined the #ShortHairDontCare club! Do we like? #LOBS4LIFE,” Atkin, a celebrity hairdresser who has styled A-listers such as Katy Perry, Jessica Alba and Sofia Vergara, wrote on Instagram. New look 
Khloe rocked her new do at Kim’s Troop Beverly Hills-themed baby shower on Sunday. 
The soiree was held at a private mansion in Beverly Hills, where the Kardashian and Jenner sisters all wore striped PJs. 
It was the first time Khloe left her 35-year-old husband’s side since he was hospitalised on October 13 following his drugs and sex binge at a Nevada brothel. 'Sister Sunday' 
Sources revealed the former LA Lakers star suffered 12 strokes early on his medical emergency , which may impact his ability to walk and talk. 
His medical team doesn’t know if the damage is permanent, but he will need months of physical therapy. His kidneys, which have failed, are the immediate priority and he may need a transplant. 
It was reported on Saturday that Lamar underwent emergency surgery. Second chance ... Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom have called off their divorce. Picture: AP Photo/Evan Agostini Source: AP 
Khloe last week called off her divorce to Lamar , with her lawyer going before a judge to have the papers withdrawn. 
She filed for divorce in December 2013, but waited a year and a half as she tried to save her marriage. The pair married in 2009.
